contentList.content: Way of the Tentacle
Steel your soul and venture into its depths.
Grappling Tentacles
Your tentacled spirit bursts through the ground, covering it in squirming black tentacles and dealing [1] to enemies within [3], or half on a save.
Hypothermic Hysteria
Spew forth a conical wave of chilling psychic energy and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FROZEN">Freeze</LSTag> targets within.
Undertow
Your strikes instill the chill and pressure of the deep. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Stranglemind
Your strikes leave a mental dent. A dental, if you will. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].

"The mind has to wrap around the neck."

-Michael "Scranton Strangler" Scott
Alien Intellect

You are forever touched by the inscrutable depths, making it hard for normies to comprehend your movements and physical form. Your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> becomes 10 plus your Intelligence and Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifiers</LSTag>, and you gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic and Cold Damage.
Aphotic Eyes

Whoever coined the term "their eyes lit up" has never met you. You spent so long in the dark, your eyes absorb light and sound like a black hole. You gain the ability to see <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> creatures up to [1] away.
The Bends
Your strikes apply pressure that your targets' bodies can't handle. When dealing Psychic or Cold damage with your unarmed strikes, ignore enemies' <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistances</LSTag>.
not the radiohead album
Lesser Minds
Your brain has grown ears, or at least that's what it feels like. You gain Detect Thoughts and have Advantage on Insight Checks.
Hadal Speciation

Having spent so much time near or in an extreme environment, you've adapted and shifted your genes to match. You gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="KHB_MUSCULAR_HYDROSTATS">Muscular Hydrostats</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="KHB_VASCULAR_HYDROPHILIA">Vascular Hydrophilia</LSTag>.
Muscular Hydrostats
When you start your turn standing in >b<Black Tentacles>/b<, your melee range increases by [i]
Get me out of here! I feel like I'm <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLACK_TENTACLES">pupating</LSTag>!
Vascular Hydrophilia

When you start your turn standing in >b<Water>/b< and have less than full hit points, you regain [1]. If your hit points are full, you regain a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Point</LSTag>.
